member.summary: Returns true if the contact did a specified activity.
member.param: Name of the activity to check (can specify more than one separated with semicolon, all of the types match than)
Name of the activity which cancels the original activity (for example UnsubscribeNewsletter is a canceling event for SubscribeNewsletter etc.)
Constraint for last X days (if zero or negative value is given, no constraint is applied)

member.name: M:CMS.Activities.ActivityInfoProvider.GetContactsEdgeActivity(System.Int32,System.String,CMS.DataEngine.OrderDirection)
member.summary: Returns TOP 1 from the contact's activities ordered by . ActivityType filter may be specified by setting value of .
member.remarks: Use to obtain first contact's activity or to obtain last contact's activity.
If activityType is set to null/empty, returns first/last activity among all activities

member.name: M:CMS.Activities.ActivityInfoProvider.BulkMoveActivitiesToAnotherContact(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves all activities assigned to the contact identified by given to the contact identified by .
member.remarks: This method should be used only in the merging process. Note that there is no consistency check on whether the contacts with given IDs exist or not (nor is the foreign key check in DB). Caller of this method should perform all the necessary checks prior to the method invocation.
member.param: Identifier of the contact the activities are moved from
Identifier of the contact the activities are moved to

member.summary: Provides possibility to log activities.

member.name: M:CMS.Activities.ActivityLogService.#ctor(CMS.Activities.IActivityRepository,CMS.Base.ISiteService,CMS.Activities.IActivitySettings,CMS.Activities.IActivityFactory,CMS.Base.Internal.IHttpContextRetriever)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of .
member.exception: is null -or- is null -or- is null -or- is null -or- is null.

member.name: M:CMS.Activities.ActivityLogService.Log(CMS.Activities.IActivityInitializer,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Logs given activity. Registered are checked, activity is further processed only if all filters allow it. Then is created and is called. Afterwards all registered modifiers are applied to the . Finally the is validated by registered . Activity is stored only if it is valid. After the activity is stored, two events are raised. which should be used to hook on and also legacy activity which is there due to compatibility reasons (should not be used).
member.param: Activity initializer used to initialize logged activity.
True if activities should not be logged in administration.

member.name: M:CMS.Activities.ActivityLogService.LogWithoutModifiersAndFilters(CMS.Activities.IActivityInitializer)
member.summary: Logs activity initialized by directly to the database. Implementation does not check and does not use . If you have available please use instead. Method is designed to be used in environment without request e. g. scheduled tasks. After the activity is stored, two events are raised. which should be used to hook on and also legacy activity which is there due to compatibility reasons (should not be used).
member.param: Activity initializer used to initialize logged activity.

member.name: M:CMS.Activities.ActivityLogService.RegisterFilter(CMS.Activities.IActivityLogFilter)
member.summary: Registers filter that can filter out logging of activities. Filters are called before is created. Activity is not logged if at least one filter denies activity.

member.name: M:CMS.Activities.ActivityLogService.RegisterModifier(CMS.Activities.IActivityModifier)
member.summary: Registers activity modifier. Modifier is used to update every newly created . Modifier is called after activity is created and successfully initialized. Modifiers are global, thus they are shared across all instances of the service.

member.name: M:CMS.Activities.ActivityLogService.RegisterValidator(CMS.Activities.IActivityLogValidator)
member.summary: Registers activity validator. Validators are used to check whether the processed is valid and can be logged. Validators are global, therefore they are shared across all instances of the service.
member.param: Activity log validator to be registered

member.name: M:CMS.Activities.ActivityLogService.InsufficientLicense
member.summary: Used to check current license. Override is used only for test purposes.

member.name: M:CMS.Activities.ActivityLogService.ValidateActivity(CMS.Activities.IActivityInfo)
member.summary: Checks whether the given passes all the validators.
member.returns: True, if passes all the validators; otherwise, false

member.name: M:CMS.Activities.ActivityMemoryQueueProcessor.FillActivityIDs(System.Collections.Generic.IList{CMS.Activities.IActivityInfo},System.Int32)
member.summary: Fills the property to every in given collection.

member.name: T:CMS.Activities.IActivityLogFilter
member.summary: Can filter out logging of activities, logged through .

member.name: M:CMS.Activities.IActivityLogFilter.IsDenied
member.summary: Checks whether activity should be logged.
member.returns: Returns true if activity should not be logged, otherwise false.

member.name: T:CMS.Activities.IActivityLogService
member.summary: Provides possibility to log activities.

member.name: M:CMS.Activities.IActivityLogService.Log(CMS.Activities.IActivityInitializer,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Logs given activity. Registered are checked, activity is further processed only if all filters allow it. Then is created and is called. Afterwards all registered modifiers are applied to the . Finally the is validated by registered . Activity is stored only if it is valid. After the activity is stored, two events are fired.
member.param: Activity initializer used to initialize logged activity.
True if activities should not be logged in administration.

member.name: M:CMS.Activities.IActivityLogService.LogWithoutModifiersAndFilters(CMS.Activities.IActivityInitializer)
member.summary: Logs activity initialized by directly to the database. Implementation does not check and does not use . Final validation by is performed. Method is designed to be used in environment without request e.g. scheduled tasks. After the activity is stored, two events are fired.
member.param: Activity initializer used to initialize logged activity

member.name: M:CMS.Activities.IActivityLogService.RegisterFilter(CMS.Activities.IActivityLogFilter)
member.summary: Registers global filter which decide if activity should not be logged or otherwise. Filters are called before is created. Activity is not logged if at least one filter denies activity. Filters are global, thus they are shared across all instances of the service.

member.name: M:CMS.Activities.IActivityLogService.RegisterModifier(CMS.Activities.IActivityModifier)
member.summary: Registers global activity modifier. Modifier is used to update every newly created . Modifier is called after activity is created and successfully initialized. Modifiers are global, thus they are shared across all instances of the service.

member.name: M:CMS.Activities.IActivityLogService.RegisterValidator(CMS.Activities.IActivityLogValidator)
member.summary: Registers global activity validator. Validators are used to check whether the processed is valid and can be logged. Validators are global, therefore they are shared across all instances of the service.
member.param: Activity log validator to be registered

member.name: T:CMS.Activities.IActivityLogValidator
member.summary: Provides method for validating the and determining, whether the is valid to be logged or not. Validator can be register as global validator for all activities being logged and it is used in or .

member.name: M:CMS.Activities.IActivityLogValidator.IsValid(CMS.Activities.IActivityInfo)
member.summary: Determines whether the given is valid or not, e.g. checks consistency of activity properties.
member.returns: True if validation check was passed; otherwise, false

member.name: T:CMS.Activities.IActivityModifier
member.summary: Provides possibility to modify activity data. Can be registered in .

member.name: M:CMS.Activities.IActivityModifier.Modify(CMS.Activities.IActivityInfo)
member.summary: Mofifies activity properties. Should not rely on properties, it should only update them.
